title: 19: S1E19 – “The Boondocks” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this nineteenth episode of _[Scary Stories Told in the Dark](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/shows/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/)_, we bring you two terrifying tales from [Dan David](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/authors/dan-david/) and [Joshua L. Hood](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/authors/joshua-l-hood/), performed by host and narrator [Otis Jiry](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/performers/otis-jiry/), about the strange things that are known to happen – and that have been known to be encountered – when one ventures off the well-worn path, and into the small towns that make up what we call "_The Boondocks." _See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: [http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e19/](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e19/)
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

content:encoded:
In this nineteenth episode of _[Scary Stories Told in the Dark](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/shows/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/)_, we bring you two terrifying tales from [Dan David](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/authors/dan-david/) and [Joshua L. Hood](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/authors/joshua-l-hood/), performed by host and narrator [Otis Jiry](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/performers/otis-jiry/), about the strange things that are known to happen – and that have been known to be encountered – when one ventures off the well-worn path, and into the small towns that make up what we call "_The Boondocks." _See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: [http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e19/](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e19/)
